entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
